unnormalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Bollywood Faces a Friday Frenzy!**
normalised: **Entertainment Buzz: Bollywood Faces a Friday Frenzy!**

unnormalised: Bollywood's spilling chai this week with a clash of titans bigger than a Bandra-Worli Sea Link traffic jam! Three releases hit screens this Friday, 27/10/2023, promising a masala mix for every cinephile.
normalised: Bollywood's spilling chai this week with a clash of titans bigger than a Bandra-Worli Sea Link traffic jam! Three releases hit screens this Friday, twenty seventh october two thousand and twenty three, promising a masala mix for every cinephile.

unnormalised: First, we have 'Prem ki Problem,' a rom-com starring the perpetually youthful Anil Kapoor, proving age is just a number... and maybe a really good dermatologist. Then there's 'Dhoom Dhadaka Duty,' an action flick boasting jaw-dropping stunts (probably defying gravity somewhere near Connaught Place) and enough explosions to make Diwali jealous.
normalised: First, we have 'Prem ki Problem,' a rom-com starring the perpetually youthful Anil Kapoor, proving age is just a number... and maybe a really good dermatologist. Then there's 'Dhoom Dhadaka Duty,' an action flick boasting jaw-dropping stunts (probably defying gravity somewhere near Connaught Place) and enough explosions to make Diwali jealous.

unnormalised: But wait, there's more! Rounding out the trio is 'Saas Bahu Science,' a quirky family drama rumored to involve time travel and a very judgmental mother-in-law. Early reviews suggest it might just break the internet… or at least cause a few heated WhatsApp debates in every Indian household.
normalised: But wait, there's more! Rounding out the trio is 'Saas Bahu Science,' a quirky family drama rumored to involve time travel and a very judgmental mother-in-law. Early reviews suggest it might just break the internet… or at least cause a few heated WhatsApp debates in every Indian household.

unnormalised: Box office predictions are wilder than a Mumbai local train at 09:00 hrs. Can 'Prem ki Problem' charm its way to the top? Will 'Dhoom Dhadaka Duty' blow away the competition? Or will 'Saas Bahu Science' unlock the secrets of box office success? We'll know by Monday, 30/10/2023. Grab your popcorn and place your bets! May the best film win (and not get leaked online by 17:00 hrs, please!).
normalised: Box office predictions are wilder than a Mumbai local train at zero nine hundred hours. Can 'Prem ki Problem' charm its way to the top? Will 'Dhoom Dhadaka Duty' blow away the competition? Or will 'Saas Bahu Science' unlock the secrets of box office success? We'll know by Monday, thirtieth october two thousand and twenty three. Grab your popcorn and place your bets! May the best film win (and not get leaked online by seventeen hundred hours, please!).
